functions.loss_functions module#

class functions.loss_functions.MmdEnergy(name=None)[source]#

Bases: Module

__call__(loss_component_expert, loss_component_training, **kwargs)[source]#

Computes the maximum-mean discrepancy between two samples.

Parameters:
loss_component_experttf.Tensor

loss component based on expert input.

loss_component_trainingtf.Tensor

loss component based on model simulations.

**kwargsoptional additional keyword arguments

optional: additional keyword arguments.

Returns:
mmd_lossfloat

maximum mean discrepancy loss using an energy kernel
